activities: Apmetrix is a business intelligence platform that collects data on behalf of its clients.  Such data includes anonymized user data from smart phone devices such as user and device information, session data which is comprised of events sent to our analytics platform during a user session etc.  In addition, we collect data from their accounts on their behalf as an authorized agent so they are able to utilize our visualization platform.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data collected by Apmetrix is collected on behalf of, and authorized in writing, our clients.   We collect both anonymous and personal information (i.e Facebook ID’s, email addresses etc.) should such client wish to retrieve it.   Each client has indemnified Apmetrix that they disclose via their own “Terms Of Service” and “Privacy Policy” the type of information they are collecting.
